nhi.description: a unique id used to identify the patient, follow format AANNAX (3 alpha, 2 numeric, 1 letter, and 1 alphabetic check character)

gender.description: make sure this relates to the name and title.

preferred_name.description: field is optional and can be NULL

maiden_name.description: field is optional and can be NULL

primary_line.description: street address, must be a new zealand street address, e.g. 130 Madras Stret

secondary_line.description: field is optional and can be NULL

suburb.description: Must relate to the primary_line address, example: Christchurch Central

city.description: Must relate to the primary_line address & suburb, example: Christchurch

postcode.description: Must relate to the primary_line address & suburb & City, must be a length of 4, and only useds digits, example: 8011

region.description: Must relate to the primary_line address & suburb & City, example: Canterbury
